product_name: Sea to Summit 1-Pin Ladderlock Field Repair Buckle
long_description: No matter how far you are in the backcountry, the Sea to Summit 1-Pin Ladderlock Field Repair Buckle lets you replace a ladderlock buckle on backpack and compression straps using only a screwdriver. Stainless steel pins hold the buckle together permanently; a Phillips head screwdriver securely attaches the buckle to the webbing on your strap. Since the buckle is permanent, there's no need to have your new buckle sewn on when you're back home. Sea to Summit 1-Pin Ladderlock Field Repair Buckle is available in 2 widths: 3/4 in. and 1 in.
short_description: No matter how far you are in the backcountry, the Sea to Summit 1-Pin Ladderlock Field Repair Buckle lets you replace a ladderlock buckle on backpack and compression straps using only a screwdriver.
